column5: This newly decorated 2 Bedroom loft right off of IH35. 5 minutes from anywhere major in New Braunfels, Gruene, Schlitterbahn , the river. 20 min from the San Marcos Outlets and Texas State University. 30 Min from Austin, 30 min from San Antonio. 15 min from Interstate 10. 5 minutes from Landa Park.
column8: 2/2 Loft, less than 3 miles from river #212
